short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a big portrait viewer to your gradebook screen (to help you memorize who is who). For the Bernards Township district.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In your genesis Gradebook Screen, a button that says "Big Portraits" is added next to your quick links.

A viewer will pop up and let you cycle through the class with just student names and portraits, to help you remember who's who.

Configured for use in the RIH district only - let me know if you want or need a version of this in your own district
